headline: As risk skyrockets, current and former CFOs are in demand for audit committees
summary: Industry expert Ann Cohen says audit committees are increasingly using AI and advanced technology to run risk analytics before those risks materialize.

headline: Is It Time To Reassess Cintas (CTAS) After Its Strong Multi Year Share Price Run?
summary: If you have ever wondered whether Cintas is fairly priced or simply riding its reputation, this is a good moment to take a closer look at what you are actually paying for. The stock last closed at US$193.74, with returns of around 0.9% over 30 days, 4.8% year to date, an 82.1% gain over 3 years and a 155.0% gain over 5 years, while the past year shows a 1.9% decline. Recent coverage around Cintas has focused on its role as a major uniform and facility services provider in the US commercial...
